title: Security and Authentication
body_html:
Security and Authentication

Outbound Security

  • Sign payloads with HMAC-SHA256: header X-Huly-Signature-256
  • Enforce HTTPS targets
  • Allow per-webhook custom headers; redact in logs

Management API Security

  • Auth via existing Huly auth (session/JWT) or API key
  • Permission checks at workspace/space level
  • Optional IP allowlist

Secret Management

  • Store secrets in hidden fields
  • Rotate via update API; avoid logging secret values
